ref.mixed-citation: De Rivera, C.E., B.P. Steves, G.M. Ruiz, P. Fofonoff, and A.H. Hines. 2007. Northward spread of marine nonindigenous species along western North America: Forecasting risk of colonization in Alaskan waters using environmental niche modeling. Report for Prince William Sound Regional Citizens’ Advisory Council and U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service, 1–36. Portland.
